sentence.Network_en: On an impulse he kicked some sand into Ridge's foxhole.
sentence.Network_cn: 一时性起,他就提起脚来将一些沙子踢进里奇的坑里.

sentence.Network_en: The sentry guard dived into his foxhole and closely observed the stranger towards him.
sentence.Network_cn: 哨兵跳入了散兵坑,密切注视着陌生人向他走来.

sentence.Network_en: One of those 1 st Battalion fuckers took a dump in my foxhole.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一营的哪个混蛋在我的散兵坑里拉屎?

...设坚固的纵深的防御工事，海军陆战队学会了挖日本人的狗洞（foxhole）——深挖的防御炮弹的散兵坑，能容纳一名士兵立姿战斗。
讠 - 英汉词典 ... 壁报/ wall newspaper/ 避弹坑/ foxhole/ 壁灯/ wall lamp/bracket light/.

list.abs: July 1944 : us Marines walk away a Japanese foxhole after blowing it up with explosives , during the invasion at Saipan , in the Mariana Islands .1944年7月：美海军陆战队走出来的日本散兵坑炸药后，吹起来，我国政府在塞班岛入侵，在马里亚纳群岛。
but , as Mr Bernanke tells him : “ There are no atheists in foxholes and no ideologues in financial crises .不过，正如伯南克告诉他的：“在散兵坑里没有无神论者，在金融危机中没有空想家。”
Hollow out a foxhole in the ground ., 在地上掘一个散兵坑.
man foxholes were hollowed out by the soldiers before fighting .战斗打响之前，士兵们挖出许多个人掩体。

entry.def: A foxhole is a small hole which soldiers dig as a shelter from the enemy and from which they can shoot.

means.word_mean: 1. a small dugout with a pit for individual shelter against enemy fire

auth_sentence.content: The men in the foxhole pounded bullets in his direction.
auth_sentence.res_content: The men in the foxhole pounded bullets in his direction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The men in the foxhole pounded bullets in his direction.

auth_sentence.content: But in a foxhole, we all tend to be Keynesians.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in a foxhole, we all tend to be Keynesians.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in a foxhole, we all tend to be Keynesians.

auth_sentence.content: You get in her foxhole, she gets in your foxhole.
